name: lukelarue-gaming-platform
description: Full-stack gaming platform prototype with React frontend, Node.js backend, and GCP infrastructure

scripts.dev:login:api:win: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$env:USE_FAKE_GOOGLE_AUTH='1'; $env:USE_FIRESTORE_EMULATOR='1'; $env:FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST='127.0.0.1:8080'; $env:GCP_PROJECT_ID='demo-firestore'; npm --workspace services/login-api run dev:login-api"
scripts.dev:minesweeper:win: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Set-Location ..\lukelarue-minesweeper; if (!(Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe)) { py -3.11 -m venv .venv; & .venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install --upgrade pip; & .venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install -r requirements.txt }; $env:USE_INMEMORY='0'; $env:FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST='127.0.0.1:8080'; $env:GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT='demo-firestore'; $env:ALLOW_ANON='1'; $env:DEFAULT_USER_ID='local-demo'; & .venv\Scripts\python.exe -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000"
scripts.dev:losiento:win: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Set-Location ..\losiento; if (!(Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe)) { py -3.11 -m venv .venv; & .venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install --upgrade pip; & .venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install -r requirements.txt }; $env:USE_INMEMORY='1'; $env:FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST='127.0.0.1:8080'; $env:GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT='demo-firestore'; $env:ALLOW_ANON='1'; $env:DEFAULT_USER_ID='local-demo'; & .venv\Scripts\python.exe -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8001"
scripts.dev:stack:all:win: npx npm-run-all --parallel dev:backend:win dev:minesweeper:win dev:losiento:win dev:stack:all:win:web dev:open:web
